fields.name: SwordQuest
fields.description: While passing through Camelot, you learn that disaster has befallen the kingdom. Morgan le Fay, the sorceress and King Arthur's half-sister, has stolen his magical sword, Excalibur!
fields.intro_text:
You are riding through King Arthur's kingdom seeking employment and adventure when your horse throws a shoe. You go to the blacksmith in Camelot and while there visit your old friend, Arthur. You learn that disaster has befallen the kingdom. Morgan le Fay, the sorceress and Arthur's half-sister, has stolen his magical sword, Excalibur!

She has gathered allies and fled to her dreaded stronghold, Castle Dolorous where she is now plotting Arthur's destruction. King Arthur asks if you will undertake the quest to return his wondrous weapon to its rightful owner?

You will have aid for many of the bold Knights of the Round Table, aided by Merlin's magic, have infiltrated the dread fortress.

Arthur cautions you that this is a very dangerous quest; but the reward for success is equally great. He then bids you farewell and good luck.

fields.name: You are outside the castle.  (NE/NW/SW)
fields.description: To the north is the castle wall.  To the south is a swiftly flowing river.  The road back to Camelot is southwest.  The path you are on goes northeast and northwest.

fields.name: You are at the castle entrance.  (W/NW/SW)
fields.description: You are at the main entrance of the castle.  You may go northwest, southwest, or west.

fields.name: You are outside the castle.  (W/NE/SE)
fields.description: To the east is the castle wall.  A narrow path leads west into a dense forest.  The path you are on goes northeast and southeast.

fields.name: You are in the forest.  (E/NW/SW)
fields.description: You are in a dense forest.  You see paths leading east, northwest, and southwest.

fields.name: You are in a clearing in the forest.  (NE)
fields.description: You see a cavalry camp.  There is a camp fire with a rabbit roasting on a spit.  Four horses are tethered to a picket rope.  A path leads northeast.

fields.name: You are at a small hill.  (D/SE)
fields.description: You see a small, grass-covered hill.  There is an opening in the side and what appear to be stairs leading downward.  A path leads southeast.

fields.name: You are in an abandoned temple.  (U)
fields.description: This is not a hill; it's an old abandoned temple overgrown with vegetation.  Piles of half-gnawed bones are on the floor.  The only exit is stairs going up.

fields.name: You are outside the castle.  (N/S/SE/SW)
fields.description: The path you are on goes southeast and southwest.  To the north you see a cave entrance.

fields.name: You are in a cave.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a bear's cave.  The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in the castle kitchen.  (N/D/SE)
fields.description: You see a stove and cooking utensils.  There are exits southeast and north, and stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are at a Y-intersection.  (W/NW/SE)
fields.description: You see a door to the northwest.  Another corridor splits off to the west.  The main corridor continues southeast.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a southeast/northwest corridor.  To the northwest you see a Y-intersection.  To the southeast is a huge door.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: To the west is a door.  To the east is a southeast/northwest corridor.  To the south is a long hallway.

fields.name: You are in the castle bakery.  (E)
fields.description: You see an oven and baking utensils; but nothing of interest.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a long hallway.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a long, dimly-lit hallway.  To the north is an east/west corridor.  There is a door to the south.

fields.name: You are in the soldier's mess hall.  (N/SE)
fields.description: You are in a large dining room.  You see many long, wooden tables and benches.  On one wall there is a cabinet full of plates and cups.  There are doors to the north and southeast.

fields.name: You are at a 4-way intersection.  (E/NE/NW/SW)
fields.description: To the northwest, southwest, and northeast are short corridors leading to doors.  To the east is a long corridor.

fields.name: You are in the soldier's barracks.  (NE)
fields.description: You see many bunk beds, foot lockers, and stacks of weapons.  Everything is locked.  The only visible exit is northeast.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You see a door to the south.  To the east the corridor continues.  To the west is a 4-way intersection.

fields.name: You are in the castle courtyard.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large courtyard.  There are enormous gates to the east.  To the west is a door.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: To the west is a T-intersection.  To the east is a Y-intersection.  There is a large square rock on the floor.

fields.name: You are at a Y-intersection.  (W/NW/SE)
fields.description: Corridors go northwest, southeast, and west.

fields.name: You are in the castle armory.  (E/U/D/NE/NW/SE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a very large circular room.  You see racks of swords, spears, and many other weapons; but they are all locked.  There are exits east, southeast, southwest, northwest, and northeast.  There are stairs leading up and down.

fields.name: You are in a dark passageway.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a dark southeast/northwest hallway.  To the southeast is a door.  There is a Y-intersection to the northwest.

fields.name: You are in the castle granary.  (NW)
fields.description: You see hundreds of sacks of wheat.  But with the price of wheat these days you cannot carry enough out to make it worth your while.  The only exit is northwest.

fields.name: You are in an narrow corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: There are doors to the east and west.

fields.name: You are in the palace guard's barracks.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a large, well lit room.  There are many comfortable beds and carved wooden chests for personal possessions and uniforms.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in a long corridor.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a wide, well-lit corridor.  There are doors to the northeast and southwest.

fields.name: You are in the palace guard's mess hall.  (SW)
fields.description: You are in a large, cheery dining room.  There are many tables and chairs.  There are dishes and eating utensils stored neatly in cabinets and on shelves.  The only exit is southwest.

fields.name: You are in a cell.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a small cell.  Hanging from the wall are manacles.  The only visible exit is south.

fields.name: You are in a passageway.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a dimly lit passageway.  There is a door to the north.  The passageway continues south.  You notice a strange burnt-out torch on the southwest wall.

fields.name: You are in a secret passageway.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: There are sliding doors to the northeast and southwest.

fields.name: You are in a passageway.  (N/S)
fields.description: You see a door to the south.  The end of the passageway is out of sight to the north.

fields.name: You are in a passageway.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a dark passageway.  To the northwest there is a door.  The passageway continues southeast.

fields.name: You are at the dungeon entrance.  (U/SE)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of a flight of stairs.  To the southeast is a passageway.

fields.name: You are in a passageway.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a dim passageway.  It continues to the northwest and southeast.  You see a plaque on the northeast wall.

fields.name: You are in the castle treasury room.  (N/S/E/W/U/NE/NW/SE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a large circular room.  There is untold wealth here; but most of it is locked tightly away.  There are doors at all eight compass points and stairs going up.

fields.name: You are in a long corridor.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: Torches are mounted on the walls.  The floor is rough and broken.  There are doors northeast and southwest.

fields.name: You are in a cell.  (SW)
fields.description: You are in a small cell.  In one corner is a straw pallet.  There is a door to the southwest.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark corridor.  The walls are damp and slimy.

fields.name: You are in a small cell.  (S/E)
fields.description: The cell is smelly and dirty.  There are exits to the south and east.

fields.name: You are in a north/south corridor.
fields.description: You are in a long, rough corridor.  The walls and floor are stained with blood.

fields.name: You are in the torture chamber.  (N/NE)
fields.description: You see the most complete array of pain inflicting devices in the civilized world.  Morgan certainly keeps abreast of the latest technology.  You feel sick.  You see door to the north and northeast.

fields.name: You are in a long corridor.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a very long northeast/southwest corridor.  It is well lit.

fields.name: You are in a long corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a wide, well illuminated corridor.

fields.name: You are in the castle mill.  (N)
fields.description: You see a grinding mill and many sacks of wheat.  There is a large quantity of flour in a corner.  Near one wall there is a chair and table with a flickering candle.  The exit is a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: The walls and floor are smooth and seem to have been carved out of living rock.  The light is poor.  There are doors to the east and west.  The south wall looks exceptionally smooth...

fields.name: You are in a small cell.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a small featureless cell.  The only visible exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a secret passageway.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a secret north/south tunnel.  There is a sliding door to the north and a door to the south.

fields.name: You are in a hidden room.  (N/W/U)
fields.description: You are in a sorcerer's supply room.  The shelves are lined with many strange and incredible ingredients and potions.  You decide not to touch anything.  There are doors north and west and stairs up.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: There is a door to the northwest.  The corridor continues out of sight to the southeast.  You see a gem embedded in the east wall.

fields.name: You are in a secret tunnel.  (E/W)
fields.description: There is a door to the east and a sliding door to the west.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: The corridor continues to the northwest.  There is a door to the southeast.

fields.name: You are in the castle wine cellar.  (NW)
fields.description: You see many huge wine barrels lining the walls.  In the center of the room is a mixing vat.  If you had a way to transport it, you could retire and become a tavern keeper.  The only exit is northwest.

fields.name: You are in the throne room.  (N/S/E/W/D/NE/NW/SE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a huge circular room.  There is a solid gold, jewel-encrusted throne in the center of the room.  It is much too heavy to carry.  There are exits at all eight compass points and stairs down.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a wide corridor.  There are doors to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in the knights' mess hall.  (S/U)
fields.description: You are in a large, circular dining room.  The tables and chairs are finely carved.  The plates and utensils are silver, but most are locked in cabinets.  There are stairs going up and a door to the south.

fields.name: You are in a long corridor.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: You are in a wide, brightly-lit corridor.  There are doors at both ends of the corridor.

fields.name: You are at the base of the northeast tower.  (U/SW)
fields.description: You are in a large, circular room.  There are stairs going up and a door to the southwest.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a short east/west corridor.  There are doors at both ends of the corridor.

fields.name: You are at the base of the east tower.  (W/U)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  There is a door to the west and stairs going up.

fields.name: You are in corridor.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a wide, brightly-lit corridor with doors to the southeast and northwest.

fields.name: You are at the base of the tower.  (U/NW)
fields.description: You are in a large, circular room.  There is a door to the northwest and stairs leading up.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a long, wide corridor.  There are doors at both ends.

fields.name: You are at the base of the south tower.  (N/U)
fields.description: The room is circular and well lit.  There are stairs going up and a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (NE/SW)
fields.description: There is a door to the northeast and a door to the southwest.

fields.name: You are at the base of the southwest tower.  (U/NE)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  There are stairs going up and there is a door to the northeast.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west corridor.  There are doors at both ends of the corridor.  The door at the west end has a large skull and crossbones painted on it.  The word, "HALT", is neatly painted below it.

fields.name: You are at the base of the west tower.  (E/U)
fields.description: You are in a circular room whose walls are scorched and pitted.  The hairs on the nape of your neck start to tingle and stand on end.  There are exits up and east.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (NW/SE)
fields.description: You are in a corridor running southeast/northwest.  You see a door to the southeast and a door to the northwest.

fields.name: You are at the base of the northwest tower.  (U/SE)
fields.description: You are in a circular room with a door to the southeast and stairs leading upward.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the northwest tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  There are no windows.  Stairs lead up and down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the northwest tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  There are narrow slit windows.  There is a bed in one corner.  There is a stairway leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the northwest tower.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the roof of the northwest tower.  You look out at the countryside.  There are stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are in the knights' barracks.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the knights' barracks.  You see seven comfortable beds and seven storage chests.  There are exits up and down.

fields.name: You are in the knights' library.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the knights' library.  The shelves are lined with books on arms, armour, and tactics.  Since you have read them all, they are of no interest to you.  Stairs lead up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the north tower.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the roof of the north tower.  There are stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the northeast tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a bedroom.  There is nothing of value visible.  You may go up or down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the northeast tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a non-descript room.  There are stairs leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the northeast tower.  (D)
fields.description: From the roof of the northeast tower you see a detachment of palace guards at weapons practice in the open courtyard.  They are very good.  The only exit is down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the west tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in Morgan's bedroom.  You see a large canopied bed and stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the west tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the sorceress' lair.  You see a table littered with strange equipment and jars of potions.  You see a stairway leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the west tower.  (D)
fields.description: From the roof of the west tower you can see the camp of Morgan's cavalry across the river to the south.  There are stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the southwest tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a library.  There are many open books scattered about.  You see stairs going up and down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the southwest tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  There are paintings on the wall.  You see stairs leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the southwest tower.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the roof of the southwest tower.  There are stairs down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the southeast tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: The room is circular.  It is empty of furnishings.  There are stairs going up and down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the southeast tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the castle storeroom.  There are piles of discarded junk stacked about.  Stairs go up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the southeast tower.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the roof of the southeast tower. Stairs lead down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the south tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  The only exits are stairs leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the south tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in the castle tavern.  There is a bar and some tables.  Stairs lead up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the south tower.  (D)
fields.description: From the roof of the south tower can see the river and the road back to Camelot.  The only exit are stairs leading down.

fields.name: You are on the 2nd level of the east tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a bedroom.  You see a bed, a table and a chair.  There are exits up and down.

fields.name: You are on the 3rd level of the east tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a circular room.  It is bare of furnishings.  You cannot guess what it was used for.  There are exits leading up and down.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the east tower.  (D)
fields.description: You can see the main road leading to the castle.  You see hundreds of armed troops.  You think, "How did I ever let myself get talked into this?"  The only exit is down.

fields.name: brass key
fields.description: You see a large brass key.

fields.name: Excalibur encased in crystal
fields.description: You see Excalibur encased in a large, clear block of crystal.

fields.name: altar
fields.description: You see a dusty, marble altar.  There is an inscription chiseled upon it and a strange design on one side.

fields.name: Sacred Book of Mithra
fields.description: You see a tattered book.  The title is, "The Sacred Book of Mithra".  Many of the pages seem to be missing.

fields.name: Mithra's Medallion
fields.description: You see a golden, hexagonal medallion.  On the front is the image of Mithra.  On the back are strange symbols.

fields.name: Mithra's amulet
fields.description: You see a gold amulet.  It bears the image of Mithra and is intricately engraved with symbols and pictographs.

fields.name: broadsword
fields.description: You see a well-made broadsword.  The blade is tempered steel and the hilt has intricate carvings on it.

fields.name: Glamdring
fields.description: You see a finely made sword.  "Glamdring" is engraved on the blade.

fields.name: gold ingots
fields.description: You see three gold ingots.

fields.name: Singing Sword
fields.description: You see the famous "Singing Sword".  It is a magnificent weapon.

fields.name: silver key
fields.description: You see a medium sized silver key.

fields.name: TrollsFire
fields.description: You see a beautifully crafted sword.  "TrollsFire" is engraved on the blade.

fields.name: Nothung
fields.description: You see Nothung.  The sword which the legendary Siegmund wielded.

fields.name: cabinet
fields.description: You see a large, locked steel cabinet containing many treasures.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: You see a bag of jewels.  It contains diamonds, rubies, emeralds, and other precious stones.

fields.name: crossbow
fields.description: You see a wicked-looking crossbow.

fields.name: paper1
fields.description: You see a page from the book of Mithra.  It appears very old and fragile.

fields.name: spiked mace
fields.description: You see a wicked looking mace with long, sharp spikes on it.

fields.name: gold key
fields.description: You see a plain gold key.

fields.name: battle axe
fields.description: You see a large, double-headed battle axe.  Both blades are razor sharp.

fields.name: gold plate
fields.description: You see a large, solid gold dinner plate

fields.name: Anduril
fields.description: You see the sword, "Anduril", which was forged in middle earth.

fields.name: silver coins
fields.description: You see a leather bag containing silver coins.

fields.name: chain mace
fields.description: You see a spiked iron ball attached to air on handle by a short chain.

fields.name: scimitar
fields.description: You see Sir Palomides' scimitar.

fields.name: chest
fields.description: You see a small, hand carved wooden chest.

fields.name: paper2
fields.description: You see a page from the book of Mithra.

fields.name: two-handed broadsword
fields.description: You see a large, two-handed broadsword.  It is made of the finest steel and has a jeweled pommel.

fields.name: desk
fields.description: You see a large oak desk.

fields.name: paper3
fields.description: You see a page from a book.

fields.name: short sword
fields.description: You see a very sharp short sword.

fields.name: Excalibur
fields.description: You see Excalibur.  It makes all other weapons seem insignificant by comparison.  You would almost give your soul to possess it.

fields.name: silver goblet
fields.description: You see a beautiful silver goblet.

fields.name: golden armor
fields.description: You see a gold plated suit of plate armour.

fields.name: wine keg
fields.description: You see a wine keg.  The writing on the keg says, "Chateau Rothchild 1066 A.D.".

fields.name: silver plate
fields.description: You see an engraved, silver plate.

fields.name: gold goblet
fields.description: You see a golden wine goblet.

fields.name: emerald necklace
fields.description: You see a necklace containing 24 large emeralds set in gold.

fields.name: diamond necklace
fields.description: You see a necklace containing a very large diamond.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You see a large bag of gold coins.

fields.name: pearl necklace
fields.description: Lying on a table, you see a necklace made of large, black pearls.

fields.name: gold necklace
fields.description: You see a heavy gold necklace.

fields.name: paper4
fields.description: You see a page from a book.

fields.name: paper5
fields.description: You see a torn page from the Sacred Book of Mithra.

fields.name: Grymwyr
fields.description: You see the magical sword Grymwyr.  Its hilt is inlaid with silver griffins; its strong, slender blade as black as night.  A large blood-red ruby is mounted in the pommel.

fields.name: dead trooper1
fields.description: You see the slashed remains of a trooper.

fields.name: dead trooper2
fields.description: You see the cavalry trooper's dead body.

fields.name: dead trooper3
fields.description: You see the dead body of the trooper.

fields.name: dead trooper4
fields.description: You see the dead cavalry officer.

fields.name: dead soldier1
fields.description: You see a dead soldier lying on the floor.

fields.name: dead soldier2
fields.description: You see the young soldier lying dead.

fields.name: dead soldier3
fields.description: The battle-scarred veteran has fought his last battle.

fields.name: dead soldier4
fields.description: You see the soldier's battered remains.

fields.name: dead soldier5
fields.description: You see the body of a dead soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier6
fields.description: You see the body of the old soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier7
fields.description: The young orderly lies dead on the floor.

fields.name: dead soldier8
fields.description: You see the bloody body of the strange soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier9
fields.description: You see a dead soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier10
fields.description: You see the lifeless body of the burly soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier11
fields.description: You see a lifeless soldier.

fields.name: dead soldier12
fields.description: A crumpled body lies before you.

fields.name: dead soldier13
fields.description: You look at the dead soldier's body and say, "Save me a place at the dinner table."

fields.name: dead guard1
fields.description: The guard lies on his side in a pool of blood.

fields.name: dead guard2
fields.description: You see a dead palace guard.

fields.name: dead guard3
fields.description: You see the badly slashed body of a guard.

fields.name: dead guard4
fields.description: You smile at the body of the dead palace guard.

fields.name: dead guard5
fields.description: A dead officer of the guard lies on the floor.

fields.name: dead guard6
fields.description: The body of one of Morgan le Fay's palace guard lies at your feet.

fields.name: dead guard7
fields.description: The guard lies before you, his dress uniform torn and bloody.

fields.name: dead guard8
fields.description: The boastful guardsman lies dead before you.

fields.name: dead guard9
fields.description: The dead, battered body of a guard lies on the floor

fields.name: dead guard10
fields.description: A guard lies dead on the floor.

fields.name: dead guard11
fields.description: You see what is left of the guard.

fields.name: dead guard12
fields.description: You see the body of the officer.

fields.name: dead guard13
fields.description: You see the body of a fanatical palace guard.

fields.name: dead guard14
fields.description: The guard lies dead before you.

fields.name: Sir Accolon's body
fields.description: The treacherous Sir Accolon lies dead.

fields.name: Blue Knight's body
fields.description: The formidable Blue Knight lies dead at your feet.

fields.name: Gold Knight's body
fields.description: The Gold Knight falls to the floor dead, his once shiny armor now bloody and battered.

fields.name: Green Knight's body
fields.description: The Green Knight lies dead on the cold floor, his helmet cleaved in two by the mighty blow.

fields.name: White Knight's body
fields.description: The White Knight lies vanquished, his armor now red with his own blood.

fields.name: Sir Palomides's body
fields.description: Sir Palomides lies like a broken doll in a quickly spreading pool of blood.

fields.name: Morgan le Fay's body
fields.description: The body of Morgan le Fay lies before you, beautiful even in death.

fields.name: dead wolf
fields.description: You see a dead wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf
fields.description: A rather large wolf lies dead on the ground.

fields.name: dead wolf
fields.description: You see the dead gray wolf, his sightless eyes seemingly fixed upon you.

fields.name: dead wolf
fields.description: The female wolf lies dead at your feet.

fields.name: dead cave bear
fields.description: You whisper a prayer of thanks to Mithra as you look at the carcass of the huge dead cave bear.

fields.name: dead dragon
fields.description: This is impossible!  The dragon cannot be killed by a mere mortal!

fields.name: dead panther
fields.description: With a sigh of relief you look at the dead panther.

fields.name: Sir Bors' body
fields.description: The hacked and battered body of Sir Bors lies on the hard floor.

fields.name: Sir Gareth's body
fields.description: With regret you look at Gareth's dead body before you.

fields.name: Merlin's body
fields.description: With despair you look at Merlin's body.  What are the chances of success now?

fields.name: Prince Valiant's body
fields.description: Val, your old friend, is dead.  There are debts to be paid!

fields.name: Sir Percivale's body
fields.description: Percivale looks peaceful even in death.

fields.name: Sir Uwayne's body
fields.description: The unfortunate Uwayne will never again see Camelot.

fields.name: Sir Lancelot's body
fields.description: The impossible has happened!  Lancelot the greatest knight in all Christendom lies dead!

fields.name: Charlotte's body
fields.description: You look at Charlotte's dead body and vow revenge!

fields.name: secret panel
fields.description: You found a secret panel!  The panel is closed, but you could OPEN it.

fields.name: door to the south
fields.description: To the south you see a locked door in the north wall of the castle.

fields.name: door leading up
fields.description: You see stairs leading up to a locked door.

fields.name: horses
fields.description: Forget it; they would only be a nuisance.

fields.name: rabbit
fields.description: It burned during the fight, but I guess you could still eat it.

fields.name: 217 Palace Guards
fields.description: An entire legion of Morgan le Fay's fanatical palace guards quickly advance toward you.  If you know any prayers say them now!

fields.name: a secret passage down
fields.description: You discover a secret passage with stairs leading down.

fields.name: a secret passage southwest
fields.synonyms: torch,strange burnt out torch,burnt out torch,southwest wall,wall
fields.description: You see a secret passage to the southwest.

fields.name: a secret passage northeast
fields.description: You find a secret opening to the northeast.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: There is a hidden passageway to the south.

fields.name: a secret passage east
fields.description: You stumble upon a concealed exit to the east.

fields.text: The walls about you begin to shimmer.  The colors begin to merge, forming a dizzying kaleidoscope and you are transported to another part of the castle.
A pale, pink haze envelopes the dragon.  He roars once and simply blinks out of existence.
A subtle change occurs in the dragon's attitude toward you.  He is no longer fierce and hostile.  He ignores you, curls up in a corner, and goes to sleep.
Page one says, "This book contains spells for teleportation, destroying or neutralizing dragons, time travel, and invisibility."  Page two is illegible and the rest of the pages are missing.

You are quickly surrounded.  It is a good fight; but one you cannot win.  Soon you are on the ground amid the bodies of dead and dying enemies.  You see a guard approach, lift his sword, and bring it arcing down toward your head...
It says, "<<TELEPORTATION>>                                                     To teleport, SAY VIA MITHRAE and have possession of the Sacred Book and medallion."
It says, "<<DRAGON DESTRUCTION>>                                                To eliminate dragons, SAY VINCERE IN NOMINIS MITHRAE and have possession of the Sacred Book, medallion, and amulet."
It says, "<<DRAGON NEUTRALIZATION>>                                             To render dragons harmless, SAY PAX MITHRAE and have possession of the Sacred Book and amulet."
It says, "<<TIME TRAVEL>>                                                       For travels forward and backward through time......."  (The rest is unreadable.)
It says, "<<INVISIBILITY>>                                                      To become in..."  The rest of the page is missing.
You see a tiny pinpoint of light.  It quickly expands in size as if someone had flung open a door in thin air!  You grip your weapon tightly and shift your weight expectantly.  A man steps out...
There is an ear shattering roar and the crystal encasing Excalibur shatters into a thousand shards, exposing the sword in all its splendor!
The Lady of the Lake appears, snatches Excalibur from you, and says, "Fool, only Arthur can wield Excalibur!"  Then she vanishes with the sword.

Arthur is beside himself with rage.  For returning to Camelot without Excalibur he strips you of armor, weapons, gold, and possessions.  You are banished and ride out of Camelot with tears of rage and shame in your eyes.
It says, "Temple of Mithra."
"I should have been a farmer like mom wanted!"
"I owe the tavern keeper at the Main Hall 20 gold pieces.  The joke's on him!"
"One of my comrades from the Free Adventurer's Guild will avenge me!"
"...of Charlotte, the lusty blonde adventuress at the Main Hall..."
"And to think I was going to retire after this one last adventure..."
"I thought I had this quest in my pocket.  What went wrong?"
"There has to be a better way to earn a living."
Arthur takes Excalibur and gratefully gives you 5,000 gold pieces!

fields.name: Trooper1
fields.description: A man wearing the crimson uniform of Morgan's cavalry shouts, "Alarm!"

fields.name: Trooper2
fields.description: A bearded cavalryman runs toward you shouting curses.  He is carrying a lance.

fields.name: Trooper3
fields.description: A young recruit reaches for his sword with a look of panic on his face.

fields.name: Trooper4
fields.description: By the campfire is a young blond man wearing officer's insignia.  He grins at you like a wolf at a lamb.  A brass key hangs from his belt.

fields.name: Soldier1
fields.description: Leaning in a corner, munching a piece of venison, is a very startled soldier.

fields.name: Soldier2
fields.description: Seated at a table, a plate of food before him, is a young soldier.

fields.name: Soldier3
fields.description: Seated across from the youth, drinking a cup of ale, is a battle-scarred veteran.

fields.name: Soldier4
fields.description: In the courtyard, practicing parries and thrusts with his sword, is a thin, agile soldier with red hair.

fields.name: Soldier5
fields.description: Leaning on his spear and dozing, is a bored-looking soldier.

fields.name: Soldier6
fields.description: Dusting the shelves and cleaning up the place, is an old soldier.

fields.name: Soldier7
fields.description: A young orderly is busy cleaning the knights' barracks.

fields.name: Soldier8
fields.description: You bump into a tall, muscular soldier with a strange look in his eyes.  He is guarding a silver key, a duty usually entrusted to the fanatical palace guard.

fields.name: Soldier9
fields.description: A short soldier with curly black hair is clutching a piece of paper in one hand and a sword in the other.

fields.name: Soldier10
fields.description: A burly soldier sees you and draws a dagger.  In his left hand is a heavy gold necklace.

fields.name: Soldier11
fields.description: A soldier is lying on the bed snoring.  He awakens with a start and hastily grabs his mace and shield.

fields.name: Soldier12
fields.description: A soldier steps out of the shadows.  He mutters an oath and unsheathes his sword.

fields.name: Soldier13
fields.description: A soldier sees you.  He bares his teeth in a wolfish grin and, drawing his two-handed great sword, says, "Free Adventurer scum!  Tonight you shall dine in hell!"

fields.name: Guard1
fields.description: You see one of the hated palace guard sitting at a bench sharpening his sword to a razor edge.

fields.name: Guard2
fields.description: Stretched out on a bed, with his armor and battle axe beside him, is a palace guard.

fields.name: Guard3
fields.description: A palace guard is sitting at a table polishing his armor.  His mace lies within easy reach.

fields.name: Guard4
fields.description: A guardsman sees you and leaps up from his table shouting, "Death to all from the Free Adventurers Guild!"

fields.name: Guard5
fields.description: An officer of the dreaded palace guard is sitting at a table, eating from a silver plate.  He folds a piece of paper and puts it into his pocket.

fields.name: Guard6
fields.description: Blocking your way is a palace guard.  He is armed with a shield and battle axe.

fields.name: Guard7
fields.description: Standing next to the cabinet is a palace guard in full dress uniform.

fields.name: Guard8
fields.description: Blocking your route to the stairs is a palace guardsman.  "Prepare to meet your end, dog!" he shouts as he readies his war axe.

fields.name: Guard9
fields.description: A member of the palace guard is sitting in the chair with his feet up on the table.  He springs to his feet, reaching for his weapon.

fields.name: Guard10
fields.description: A palace guard is carrying a box.  He sees you and freezes in mid-stride.

fields.name: Guard11
fields.description: Across the room you see a man wearing the black uniform of the feared palace guard.

fields.name: Guard12
fields.description: Near the stairs is an officer of the palace guard inspecting the weapons of the guardsman on duty.

fields.name: Guard13
fields.description: Having his weapons inspected is a very large, dangerous-looking guardsman.

fields.name: Guard14
fields.description: Near the southeast door is a second guard in dress uniform.

fields.name: Sir Accolon
fields.description: Seated at the table is the villainous Sir Accolon.  He is reading something.  Upon seeing you, he slips it into his armor and grabs his cross bow.

fields.name: Blue Knight
fields.description: A knight in blue armor is sitting at a desk reading a piece of paper.  Upon seeing you he puts it away, stands, and draws his sword in one fluid motion.

fields.name: Gold Knight
fields.description: Standing on the roof is a knight.  The sun shining on his golden armor almost blinds you.  As he turns your way, you notice an unusual amulet hanging from his neck.

fields.name: Green Knight
fields.description: A knight in green armor is sitting at a table eating from a golden plate.  A gold key hangs from his belt and a spiked mace lies beside him within easy reach.

fields.name: White Knight
fields.description: A knight in white armor lounges against a wall drinking wine from a gold goblet.  He is absent-mindedly stroking the haft of a double-bladed battle axe.  From his neck hangs a gold medallion.

fields.name: Sir Palomides
fields.description: Sir Palomides the Saracen is standing near a window examining some object.  As you approach he puts it into a small chest.

fields.name: Morgan le Fay
fields.description: Standing there is the most beautiful woman you have ever seen.  Her long blonde hair is tied back in a topknot.  Her tall, athletic body is encased in shimmering chain mail.  She looks at you.  Her green eyes are as cold as ice.

fields.name: Wolf1
fields.description: You see a wolf lying and panting in a corner.  He raises his head and his ears flick toward you.

fields.name: Wolf2
fields.description: Almost at your feet is a large wolf cracking what appears to be a thigh bone and eating the marrow.

fields.name: Wolf3
fields.description: You see a gray wolf.  His unblinking eyes seem to bore straight through you.

fields.name: Wolf4
fields.description: A female wolf is lapping water from a small pool at the far end of the temple.

fields.name: Cave Bear
fields.description: As your eyes adjust to the gloom, you see an enormous cave bear asleep at the far end of the cave.  The clanking of your armor awakens him.

fields.name: Dragon
fields.description: Lying between you and the stairs is the biggest, most ferocious, fire-breathing dragon you have ever seen.

fields.name: Panther
fields.description: A shadow in the corner seems to flow toward you.  You see a magnificently-muscled black panther gliding toward you with fangs bared and claws unsheathed.  His lime green eyes are focused intently upon you.

fields.name: Sir Bors
fields.description: You see a tall knight in brightly polished armor.  His visor is up and he winks at you and grins.

fields.name: Sir Gareth
fields.description: A tall knight rushes up to you.  From the device on his shield you recognize him as Sir Gareth.  He opens his visor and smiles.

fields.name: Merlin
fields.description: You see an old man in a black, hooded cloak and black robes and your spirits soar.  Merlin himself has come to aid you!

fields.name: Prince Valiant
fields.description: A warrior suddenly steps forward.  You would recognize that red horse head insignia anywhere.  The sword in his hand seems to hum faintly.  You say, "Hi, Val."

fields.name: Sir Percivale
fields.description: A young ascetic-looking knight greets you.  He looks better suited to a monastery than a battlefield.  Looks can be deceiving however.

fields.name: Sir Uwayne
fields.description: A dark skinned knight is about to ascend the stairs.  He sees you and salutes with his sword point.  It is Uwayne.

fields.name: Sir Lancelot
fields.description: A handsome, smiling knight cuffs you good-naturedly on the ear and asks if all Free Adventurers are such laggards.  You have found Lancelot!

fields.name: Charlotte
fields.description: You see a familiar figure in light chain mail armor.  It is a fellow member of the Free Adventurer's Guild.  She nods to you and smiles.  You smile back.

fields.question: How do I survive the legion of guards?
How do I get past the dragon?
Where is the Sacred Book of Mithra?
Where are the missing pages to the Sacred Book?

fields.answer: 1. Before you can manipulate items that are inside other items, you must REMOVE them.
2. You can INVENTORY friendly monsters to see what they are carrying.
3. If you GIVE a healing potion to a monster, they will take a drink and hand it back to you.
4. The POWER spell has different effects in most adventures.  When all else fails try POWER.
5. Sometimes things may be in a room but won't show up until you EXAMINE them.  Pay close attention to room descriptions.
6. To give money to a monster, type GIVE and the amount.  (e.g. GIVE 200)
You can't; just don't ever go to that room.  (NE from the starting room, SE from outside the castle.)
You must use one of the spells of Mithra...
While carrying the Sacred Book, Mithra's Medallion, and Mithra's Amulet:         SAY VINCERE IN NOMINIS MITHRAE to make him disappear...
Or, while carrying the Sacred Book and Mithra's Amulet, SAY PAX MITHRAE to make him ignore you.
While holding the Sacred Book and Mithra's Medallion, SAY VIA MITHRAE to teleport to a random location.
EXAMINE STRANGE DESIGN in the abandoned temple, then OPEN SECRET PANEL.
It is carried by the White Knight.
It is carried by the Gold Knight.

The only three that have useable spells are in the following locations:  Paper1 is carried by Sir Accolon; Paper2 is inside the chest in the east tower; Paper3 is inside the desk in the northwest tower.  The other pages are useless.
